### Loading packages

```{r}
library (tidyverse)
```

### Importing data

```{r}
r2_data <- read_csv ("/Users/charaveebasnetchettri/Desktop/SpecialStudy/EMF37viz/data-raw/iiasa-db-data/emf37_usacanmex.csv")
```

### Finding variables

```{r}
data_vars <- r2_data %>%  
  group_by (variable) %>% 
  summarize (total = sum (value))
```

### Selecting Data

```{r}
r2_filt <-r2_data %>% 
  filter (region == "United States",
          variable == "Emissions|BC" | 
            variable == "Emissions|CO" |
            variable == "Emissions|NOx" |
            variable == "Emissions|PM10" | 
            variable == "Emissions|PM2.5" | 
            variable == "Emissions|Sulfur" |
            variable == "Emissions|VOC")
```

### Exporting Data

```{r}
library (writexl)

write_xlsx(r2_filt,"\\Users\\charaveebasnetchettri\\Desktop\\SpecialStudy\\EMF37viz\\spstd_1.xlsx")
```

### Graphing by Scenario

### BC

```{r}
r2_filt <- r2_filt %>% 
  filter (year <= 2050)

scen_BC <- r2_filt %>% 
  select (-model, -region) %>% 
  filter (variable == "Emissions|BC") 

ggplot (data = scen_BC, mapping = aes (x = year, y = value))+
  geom_line(color = "blue")+
  facet_wrap (~scenario)+
  labs (title = "1a) BC emissions by Scenario",
        x = "Year",
        y = "Emissions|BC (Mt BC/yr)")

```
